timeline.content: Hey Yuen, Thanks for contacting amber for your accommodation search in London! I am Sanya and I'll be helping you book your ideal student home. Happy to assist you with the process ahead. Thankyou : )

transcripts.transcript_text:
Speaker A: Hello?
Speaker B: Hello?
Speaker A: Hi, is this Yuan? Speaking.
Speaker B: Yeah.
Speaker A: Hi, Un, I'm Sanya from Amber Student.
Speaker B: Hello.
Speaker A: Hi. So you inquired about access LinkedIn on our website?
Speaker B: Yes, but I just need a little bit of time to talk to my family about this.
Speaker A: Oh, yeah, yeah. Please, take your time. No, I just wanted to see if, you know, you or your family has any questions regarding the property payment plan guarantor. Anything that I can help you with?
Speaker B: No.
Speaker A: No. Okay. All right. In case you have. You can give me a call back. My name is so much. And yes, I'll be happy to help you. No problem. All right, take care. Bye.
Speaker B: Bye.
